channel.title: Different sprites for admins - Bluurrs Client
channel.description:
Hello i was wondering, how do i make it so that there's some custom sprites next to my name on my server. Im using bluurrs client and it's got custom sprites in there already, but i don't know how to make it so that when i speak or a mod or a admin it has a custom sprite next to your name. Do i have to add something in my server files?
Please help i`ll appreciated it Thanks

@Kalvin wrote:

I don’t need to do anything, the sprites are already in the client, i think. I’m just saying would i need to add something to my server side? to make the crown appear…?

item.source: Different sprites for admins - Bluurrs Client

item.title: Different sprites for admins - Bluurrs Client
item.dc:creator: @sinedscape sinedscape
item.description:
@sinedscape wrote:

ermm. you mean custom crown?

if so, so you need to check the file type of the item.
say if “Blurrs” client has .jag images, you would need to change the file type to .jag, and replace it with the crown which is their at the moment. im not sure this is the same for the client i worked with, but it did have the golden crown their, which you would have to move, and name your custom one that exact file name/type…

hope i could help :rolleyes:

Read full topic
item.source: Different sprites for admins - Bluurrs Client
